title: Robb Report Adds 'Sparkle' to Holiday Shopping
itunes:title: Robb Report Adds 'Sparkle' to Holiday Shopping
description:
Paul Croughton, Editor in Chief at the Robb Report, discusses luxury items and experiences from their Holiday Gift Guide.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
